compatibility.notes: LGPL-3.0+ allows linking with proprietary software under certain conditions. Static linking may impose more restrictions than dynamic linking.

key_requirements: Include a copy of the LGPL-3.0+ license with any distribution of the Library or Combined Work.
State any changes made to the Library when distributing modified versions.
Provide access to the Corresponding Application Code for Combined Works.
license.name: LGPL-3.0+
obligations: If you modify the Library, you must convey the modified version under this License or the GNU GPL.
You must provide a copy of this License when distributing the Library or a Combined Work.
You must make a good faith effort to ensure that the facility operates even if the Application does not supply the required function or data.
